EXTRACTED VALUE: Chase Budinger (ankle) will return for the Rockets in Friday's game against the Raptors.
Impending free agent G Anthony Carter said he hopes to sign a one-year deal to remain in Denver.
Vladimir Radmanovic is ahead of Brandan Wright in the battle for power forward minutes off the bench.
Jordan Hill started at center for Yao Ming (foot) on Saturday, but scored just seven points on 3-of-5 shooting with four rebounds and two blocks.
Francisco Garcia (flu) didn't complete Sunday's practice because of dizziness.
Bobcats rookie Derrick Brown scored a career-high 18 points off the bench on Saturday, going 5-of-11 from the field and 8-of-8 from the FT line.
Shannon Brown scored 17 points off the Lakers bench on Sunday, making 7-of-10 FGs including three 3s.
Delonte West (fractured wrist) is scheduled for surgery Tuesday.
Nicolas Batum grabbed a career-high 14 rebounds off the bench on Sunday, adding 13 points and one rebound in 30 minutes.
Timberwolves center Ryan Hollins was traded to the Cavaliers as part of Monday's four-player swap.
